title: #741 - Alonzo Bodden
description:
Alonzo Bodden, comedian, winner of "Last Comic Standing" season 3, and the host of the "Who's Paying Attention?" podcast, joins Joey Diaz and Lee Syatt live in studio.

This podcast is brought to you by:

Manscaped - Get 20% off your first order and a travel bag if you purchase “The Perfect Package” at www.manscaped.com and use the code CHURCH
 
Hellotushy.com - Go to Hellotushy.com/church for 10% off of your order of portable devices that spray your butt with water.
 
Athletic Greens - Get 20 free travel packs worth $79 when you go to www.athleticgreens.com/church
 
Onnit.com. Use Promo code CHURCH for a 10% discount at checkout.
